name: Protocol Guild
about: The Protocol Guild helps Ethereum's ecosystem + community fund core protocol development: a foundational Public Good for all. The Guild curates a weighted membership registry of ~128 active contributors, which anyone can donate to via a single Ethereum address. Donations are vested to members over time, creating long-term stewarding incentives. Learn more: https://bit.ly/PG-docs

question_2: Just as Ethereum doesn't allocate a % of block rewards to fund Public Goods, the Protocol Guild doesn't have a native source of funding.
